pageTitle: Events and Activities - Embassy of the State of Palestine
heroSubtitle: Follow the latest events and activities of the Embassy of the State of Palestine in the Republic of Turkey, and learn about our efforts in strengthening cultural and social ties.

event1.title: Embassy of the State of Palestine to the Republic of Turkey Commemorates the 77th Nakba Anniversary
event1.description: The Embassy of the State of Palestine and the Palestinian community in Ankara organized an event to commemorate the seventy-seventh anniversary of the Nakba...

event2.title: Nakba 77: We Will Not Leave... Palestine for Palestinians
event2.description: On the 77th anniversary of the Nakba, the Embassy of the State of Palestine and the Palestinian community in Ankara are honored to invite you to participate...

event3.title: Blessed Ramadan Month
event3.description: His Excellency Ambassador Dr. Faed Mustafa and all embassy staff extend their highest congratulations on the occasion of the holy month of Ramadan.

event4.title: Announcement Regarding Palestine Youth Orchestra
event4.description: The Edward Said National Conservatory of Music announces an invitation to all musicians of Palestinian origin to participate in the Palestine Youth Orchestra.

event5.title: Participation in the International Cultures Festival
event5.description: The Embassy of the State of Palestine participated in the annual International Cultures Festival organized by the Ebrişem Foundation...

event6.title: Dr. Fathiya Nasro Educational Research Award
event6.description: The Embassy announces the Ministry of Education's launch of the "Dr. Fathiya Nasro Educational Research Award" in honor of her spirit and in commemoration of her efforts.

event7.title: Second Palestinian Educational Innovation Conference in Istanbul
event7.description: The International Palestinian Innovation Foundation and the Supreme Council for Innovation and Excellence organized the Second Palestinian Educational Innovation Conference.

event8.title: Embassy of the State of Palestine to the Republic of Turkey Commemorates the Nakba
event8.description: The Embassy of the State of Palestine and the Palestinian community in Ankara organized an event to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the Nakba at the embassy premises.

event9.title: Solidarity Stand in Ankara in Support of Al-Aqsa and Solidarity with the Palestinian People
event9.description: The Turkish Hak-İş Labor Union organized a solidarity stand at the Embassy of the State of Palestine in support of Jerusalem and the blessed Al-Aqsa Mosque.

event10.title: Ambassador Dr. Faed Mustafa Congratulates on the Arrival of the Holy Month of Ramadan
event10.description: His Excellency the Ambassador and all embassy staff extend their highest congratulations to all members of the community and Palestinian students on this occasion.

event11.title: General Union of Palestine Students Contributes to Earthquake Relief Efforts
event11.description: The General Union of Palestine Students in Turkey continues its relief and volunteer role in full coordination with the Embassy of the State of Palestine.
